content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were going to town and decided to take a couple of fall pics with my phone.The two pics i took were less than a min apart (maybe 5-10 seconds.The first pic there is nothing in sky,just weird smoke circles,noticed by my mother when we were looking at the pics.The second pic has a object in it that we cannot explain.We do not know where it came from.It was large enough to show a reflection on my car hood(shown in pics.
content.summary: Happend within 1 min

content.detailedDescription: Dont want to talk abaut ... sorry ...
content.summary: Weel there is no god ... dont want to talke abaut

content.detailedDescription: A friend posted this picture in instagram.  the subject of the photo is the flower and boat arrangement on the lake side.  ufo was noticed well after the picture was taken. the lake is morse
content.summary: Saw a ufo in a photo taken by a friend for a photography project. was not subject of photo. just happened to be in background and not noticed until some time after the photo was taken.

content.detailedDescription: Was at an outdoor party in a suburban area of holyoke. looking between the houses and up, i saw a very bright red light very high up in the sky. it was twice the magnitude of brightness of venus at its brightest, and twice the size of venus at least. at first i thought it was mars, but realized 1. mars is never that bright. 2. it was in an area of the sky mars could not be in (straight overhead). then things got weird. it started to move towards the north, but extremely slowly. then it wavered from side to side in a herky jerky fashion. while doing this it started to fade in brightness. its color went from intense bright red to dull red to a faded light green. as it faded, it almost looked like you could possibly make out a structure had binoculars been available (they weren't). one other person witnessed this and filmed it, commenting that it certainly was not a plane and was exhibiting strange movements. i watched the sky for a good five minutes after it faded to see if it returned. it did not. then roughly 15-20 minutes later, it was back, and in the exact same position. this time it moved in the same stuttering side to side fashion as it headed north again, but faded very quickly this time, if it turned pale green it was not apparent this time. i again watched the part of the sky it disappeared in, but it did not return. time of first sighting, roughly 2-3 minutes. time of second sighting about 45 seconds-1 minute. it did not reappear. things it could not have been: mars, airplane, balloon with laser (would have been not enough time to get the thing down, restart the laser, and get it to that height again, also would have to have been a fairly powerful laser), chinese lantern hot air candle balloon. it appeared to be at least a half a mile up minimum. could have been a drone, but the stuttering motion while moving would seem to preclude that as well. no sound.
content.summary: Bright red light hovering silently, then moving slowly while jittering side to side and fading to dull red then out, reappeared 15 minutes later same place, repeating its motions

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the terrace.Then i saw a stationery light in the sky.It was a white light.It was stationary for 10-15 mins.I saw show unsealed alien files on history channel so i believe in ufos .I was surprised. i called my brother but when i came back it dissapered.
content.summary: The ufo was stationary for 10 mins

content.detailedDescription: One object far far up, the same direction (north east), suddenly south, and then heading north west. it had an average pace, seen aircraft and helicopters in the same area but never the direction and the height. after it had changed direction last time it got more speed and disappeared. it seemed like it flew very accurate, and a plane can not change course as fast and as "perfect" like that.
content.summary: Was out burning garbage about 11 pm at night, very very bright sky and clear

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside looking for ufos. we saw a v of geese fly by at about 8:40pm central time on september 29th 2014. my boyfriend pointed the birds out to me. we were excited to have seen this occurrence, since it would seem to be a rare event. i then looked back toward the west slightly and saw a large round light directly above us. i told him to look at the light and i asked if it was a plane. his response was that it wasn't and then pointed to a plane to the northwest of the ufo that had a blinking light. the ufo stayed hovering above us for about 1 minute and then began to move toward the east. now the ufo was positioned over our home. it began to ascend quickly and then disappeared. another then appeared to the north of the previous positioned ufo. this ufo appeared to be much higher in elevation. it traveled south and then changed directions upward in the same spot and also disappeared. these ufos i believe were showing us why we have so much activity going on in this area. this seems to be an energy sourced transporting area.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two ufos spoted moving over our home, the first one seen was lower, second was higher. both shooted upward and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I felt an energy and my cat was acting really irate, and i looked out the window and saw an object. it flashed a royal blue and red light and continued to travel ne from my sight.
content.summary: Object flashing royal blue and red light 50 ft from my view.

content.detailedDescription: Im sorry i know you want every detail but the last few are drving me crazy, i want to report what i saw, which to me is my first ufo but have been hoping, as a missive skeptick, that someone will prove me wrong. i saw what i though was an awesome shot for a satellite coming by in non polar orbit, and then it swithed directions... and turned into three lights... so fast it was not possible. it went a true 90 degrees and the light never whent out... no turn hard from a far distance like a jet..... it stopped and turned on a dime, just straight my way, and the dot when it got closer was more like three... at this point i shut my blinds up... i don't want to be that asshole that gets taken, but in afterthought, whats the point of denying it!? that was amazing. keep record because that was for sure not a jet... they h ave to turn, and have like lights the describe which side your seeing.... and constant reflection and 90 degree turns in less than a second isnt on the menue!!!! so happy ive always wanted to see one... i know now. ive seen it. ive seen it you cant take that from me
content.summary: No idea but what i saw was not in anyway real human stuff. my grandpa was on the enterprise i've seen all the black budget has cuz he let me. this s**t was actual and real... holly s**t

content.detailedDescription: My two friends and i left for our deer stands heading in about 4:45 in the morning they went on past me when i reached my stand i was up in my climbing tree stand about 18ft. it was a beutifull morning clear sky full of stars .Then it happened trees started to blow around like a very high wind i was up in tree swinging around like craxy .  thats when i got scared as i looked to the sky it was all stars i am thinking what the hell  then a black mass started covering the stars as it went over head this lasted about 10 min. as it moved past the stars started to reapear overhead wind was blowing vilently until black mass was gone . the craft made no sound . my buddies had no expierence . we were hunting on the southeast corner of fort leonard wood . it was quite a expierence i will never forget. & in ending it did scare the hell out me.
content.summary: Deer hunting came overhead blocked out stars as it went by trees started to blo around like in a big storm but not a sound to be heard

content.detailedDescription: So earlier today, october 2nd 2014, my wife and i were going through some of her grandmother's old belongings, we found a 50 year old photo album full of photos from around the time my wife's mother was born, they were living in albuquerque because her husband was a captain in the us air force, so these photos are all from 1961 through 1965. so we started looking through this photo album, and all of a sudden we flipped the page and there are five beautiful photographs of my wife's grandfather in civilian clothing pointing up at the most immaculate day time disc i have ever seen. after the five ufo photos there are a few pages of airplanes, helicopters, hangers, and him sitting at his desk in the base he worked on, talking with several other officers. when i saw these photos, i was dumbfounded. just because of the context of them within the whole photo album gives these much more credibility to me. we are not looking for any kind of publicity, i think you will see these are just some very special photos, and we want to share them with others so we can try to put a few more pieces together of this mystery.
content.summary: 1961 albuquerque ufo photos, 5 photos taken by capt. of the us air force

content.detailedDescription: Was outside on my back patio, as usual looking at the night sky. noticed a rapidly moving delta wing like object transparent in nature w/ a faint bluish hue traveling nw to se. viewed the object for no more then 10 secs. before it disappeared. 30 seconds prior to this my son also saw similar object directly above us moving north to south and disappeared.
content.summary: Bluish transparent delta wing like craft

content.detailedDescription:
While enjoying the crisp fall air after several days of continued rain, i observed 6 separate orbs traversing the sky from northeast to southeast.  i'm not sure if there were more orbs/balls of light before i looked up.  all i can account for is what i saw.  i saw at first a pair of orbs flying in tandem flying in, what appeared, close proximity.  they moved around each other but not circling each other completely.  the second pair came from the same trajectory but were spaced farther apart and appeared to be flying at a fixed distance from each other.  the last two orbs came and went across the horizon at the same trajectory one at a time.  one would appear in the ne and disappear in the se one at a time.  i recorded all the observances on my phone and uploaded them on you-tube.  the first recording of the close proximity tandem pair has a rather "unusual" anomaly.  the second pair and one of the last singles were unmolested and uploaded on you-tube.  please contact me for the you-tube info.

12 witnesses
content.summary: Observed 6 seperate orbs traversing the evening sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a couple of weeks ago, thursday sept. 18th. i was spending a week at a painting workshop staying at the mabel dodge luhan house in taos. in the middle of the night (3am) my eyes blinked open and sort of on automatic pilot i got my flashlight, walked down an unknown path off the hotel grounds into the desert (which i later found out was anasazi land), and looked up to see a marvelous sight...6 or 7 dense, huge, bright clusters of stars, roughly diamond shaped clusters, lights turning on and off like someone was playing with a light switch. the sky around these discreet clusters was blue/black...Like islands in a dark ocean, the little dipper was over my left shoulder fairly low in the sky. i've been told it was probably something from los alamo's. i went in for my annual physical and the doc said to stop taking ambien, that i was sleepwalking. a friend asked suspiciously "were you the only one there"?, another friend sited an article in the nytimes on lightening-induced 'sprites'.

i suppose there's an alternative conclusion but what is so strange and compelling for me is the fact that i'm not comfortable in nature even with friends and for sure i wouldn't go out alone in the middle of the night to a desert i didn't know existed. i'm also a germaphobe. this sounds so dumb but i have my indoor slippers that never go outside but i slipped them on without hesitation. i had in fact not gone on the 2 field trips during the painting workshop because i'm pathologically afraid of snakes, all reptiles, but not even easy with dogs, cats, insects, dirt...Well you get the picture, nature woman i am not! so for me to without hesitation wake up and walk into the desert without an iota of fear is just impossible when i reflect on it. 

i did a painting the next day to capture what i saw so will attach it.I'd love to know if anyone else in the area saw what i saw. i stood out there for about 15 minutes until i heard a dog start howling and decided to go back inside.
best,
cp

p.S. i'm pretty sure it was sept 18th but it could have been a night before or after.
content.summary: Huge, bright clusters of stars, roughly diamond shaped clusters, lights turning on and off like someone was playing with a light switch

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday september 21, 2014 i had begun taking some photos at different times due to the clear sky at the time.  i began at 11:09 a.M with a short movie sequence that lasted 17 seconds.  when i first looked at it, i didn’t notice anything. on closer study i discovered two faint grey craft.

craft #1--at 11:30 a.M., i noticed a white object above one of the trees in the back yard which suddenly appeared and seemed to be staying roughly in the same place.  i took a series of five still shots on my 300 mm zoom and the focus was set near infinity.  the direction was almost due north for the first one, and about 355° for the fifth one.  i knew it was not a bird or plane or anything identifiable.  the craft appears to actually be two of them in tandem, as it bears some resemblance to the white craft in case # 59835 (seven days earlier).  it appears to have been hovering over the blue springs lake area.

at 6:37 p.M. i shot a second short movie which lasted 23 seconds, and in which once again, i didn’t notice anything upon first view of the movie.  closer inspection by analysis of the frames of both movies revealed two new faint grey craft which moved extremely rapidly.   each movie was shot in the same general direction at 346°.   

•	the important thing is that these faint grey craft seem to be coming from the blue springs lake area, rising at extremely rapid rates, and occur quicker than the human eye can see.  in both movie sequences, they rise and move out of the scene area in .55 seconds or less, some in as little as .13 seconds. not only that, but craft #2 described below made sudden turns that are beyond any human technology.  the “g” forces alone would be incredibly high unless accounted for in some way.

craft #2 zigzag—the first movie sequence—the craft shot up at an angle of 25° and the 37 frames elapsed in .55 seconds.  the craft traveled straight, effected a sudden 90° turn, three frames later a sudden 45° turn and left the screen.  this zigzag pattern was remarkable.  

craft #3—second movie sequence--shot up at an angle of 40° and the 20 frames of its observed flight elapsed in .33 seconds.

craft #4—second movie sequence--shot up at an angle of 55° and the 8 frames of its observed flight elapsed in .13 seconds.

craft #5—appears at the end of the zig zag sequence of craft #2 and can be seen in the composite image attached.   a pointer indicates its location though it’s faint in the composite.

the attached satellite photo shows dark areas in blue springs lake near the projected origins of the craft.  in fact they appear to be rectangular, which is odd for the bottom of a lake.  upon checking, there were no large building structures in the middle area of land prior to the lake’s construction in the 1980s.  (the two red lines close to each other point to the area covered by the zigzag). the far right red line points to where a direct line reverse trajectory indicates direction of origin of craft #2.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Five objects i one day

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from epping to loughton,through epping forest, when i reached upshire i saw a tiangle shaped craft pass overhead,it was matt black underneath with green & orange lights.There was no sound the hairs on the back of my neck stood on end.I pulled over & watch it move in a nw direction it was moving smothly & slowly the forest was silent & there was a strange feel in the air. the craft moved slowly across the tree line.I moved further down to get a better veiw but it had gone.
content.summary: A triangle shaped craft passed overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
Before working in city of nouméa, it habit mine go windsurfing for one hour in early morning.
my spot is usual anse vata to off land island ilot canard. with trade winds is very common wind in morning.

so one morning i is doing usual hobby when seeing something different me used to. the water is calm in morning and very like pool. i see after jibing three black spot in horizon coming bigger from direction of mont d'or which south east my position. i not understand, finish at ilot canard jibe again but looking back and see is three globes closer me. i jibe again ( jibe is 180 degré turn in water surface in windsurf) close beach and viewing the golf ball size sphere black coulor with maybe like airplane windows and people in back. they seem looking me! i continue my course about one nautiqual mille and the sphere not move, i jibe again from ilot canard and the sphere go slowly down into lagoon all three. me never sea this but continue my habit windsurfing.

but i hear when landing water the buzz with vapor hot water in air like the sphere make boiling the water. lagoon is deep where land and disappear my vision.
content.summary: Windsurfing and see ufo land in water

content.detailedDescription: It was a moon lighted morning, suddenly a very bright light mostly white and yellow in color appeared, was much brighter than moon light, most of light brightness then disappeared, a jagged edged wreath (doughnut hole) object appeared and was in many different colored lights.  object hovered a few seconds, then dumped many solid dark jagged looking objects from the saucer. in about 5 minutes a second object appeared out of the bright light, stopped and hovered, very much looked like the first object (wreath with jagged edges similar to a doughnut and hole). saucer was totally illuminated in a different color than 1st craft, dumped large chunks of dark material over the sides of craft, then left area in a blink of an eye.  both craft vanished as soon as they dumped the dark material over the sides.  i physically got sick, something like the flu that has lasted since.  did go to emergency room several days later, but they stated whatever i had was not treatable with medicines, it was not bacteria related, might be "virus" of some type.
content.summary: 2 each occurrances within 10 minutes, very bright light then a bright aray wreath, then dumped broken material

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside and one of my neighbors ran over to get me to come out and look. 

i and four of my neighbors in my apartment complex saw three white lights--they appeared like solid objects either glowing or reflecting the sunlight--first they hovered for around a half hour, then headed south-west very, very slowly. it all happened towards the south east of the valley. they were in a line like this :  *  *    *  only tipped to the right at almost a 45 degree angle. as they slowly moved off, they began to tip towards horizontal, though not quite, and the last one, the one furthest apart, moved farther apart. no civilian planes flew during this time, only military jets (i don't know much about military planes, but the ones that leave the trails).  they kept flying past the lights without coming in close, usually west of the lights, but after they left our view, another one came along flying to the east of where they had been. the planes were all, to the best of my knowledge, flying from north to south.

 during the event, the sun was right on top of them, making them tricky to spot, but clear once they were pointed out. that also meant that getting anything like a clear shot of them was impossible on cell phones, which is all anyone had. it looked to me like they were reflecting the sunlight, though another neighbor said "if you concentrate real hard, you can see the glow." (i'm not sure of the exact wording, but that was the basic gist)

my reactions? i was excited and a bit confused as to why i wasn't freaking out. i was trying to remember as much detail as i could. for a while, maybe 5-10 minutes, i would try to do a search with the words "ufo salt lake valley oct. 2, 2014" and i couldn't get the search results to stay for more than maybe 10-30 seconds. i clicked a couple links and the same thing happened--i was taken back to a blank google search page. one other neighbor experienced something similar at the same time, but everything started working fine again shortly.


how they left our sight: there was a line of trees and a building that blocked our view once they moved far enough to the south west.
content.summary: 3 bright white lights in diagnol line

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday morning, i woke up with the sun in my eyes, so i turned over. i pulled the blanket over me an i noticed stood in my bedspace(1 metre ish away) (3 man room) was a 6ft reptilian creature. it had a smooth head, it was transparent and it had a belt around its waist. with over 12 silver cylinders 50mm length 25mm diameter.
 it was slightly hunched over.. 
 we looked at each other for about 30 seconds, it froze but was still breathing because it saw i could see it. i froze because i didnt know what to make of it. (i wasnt afraid. oddly.. probably puzzled)
and after our stare out, it planted an idea in my head to sleep with i did.. i came round and it was gone. then i was in absolute fear for about 15 minutes. i eventually got out of bed to do a room clearence. it wasnt there.. i left my room and was surprised alot of people where up an doing a normal morning routine. nobody knew what had just happend. i was going to file a report to the guard room but i would of sounded crazy. so i didnt.
to clarify i had never heard of a reptilian. i didnt believe in aliens. i didnt even know david icke and its 100 percent true.

event happend in - barker barracks, paderborn. block 2 middle floor. i cant remember to room number as it was only transit accomidation.
it is an army camp and i was in the british army.  
(the sketch is not complete)
content.summary: I didnt see a ufo. just an alien. why is it making me answer this......

content.detailedDescription: After requesting pictures from my aunt of the beach she took 4 pictures in a row, one of their house. after i zoomed in to look at the picture of the house i noticed something above it, it has a circular body with what seems to be two triangular type apendages such as wings attached to it. when zoomed in you can see a slight change in color where the apendage meets the circular body, suggesting a change in depth or texture.  their is an airbase within an hours drive and we occasionslly see fighter jets fly over, but its nothing like this photo and you can clearly hear the jets, this object in the photo was unnoticed until i replied to my aunt with a zoomed in photo of it. there were no kites being flown, no jets were near by, and i have a picture of a flying bird at their beach house from the same camera and this is clearly not a bird. the pictures were taken from an iphone 5 camera and the object on the screen appears in no other photos taken at the time.
content.summary: Photo of mysterious object over beach house, most common flying objects can be ruled out

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to my neighbors house at about 10pm in the summer of 1985 or 1986.  i was with my boyfriend.  we noticed a blue light above us in the sky, more or less right above us.  it came down directly above us and hovered there.  it was too far to see any real detail, but it was far to close to not be making a sound.  it moved soooo fast down, then hovered for what seemed like a long time, but it probably wasn't that long then it went away out of sight again straight up so fast again.  there was no sound not ever.  after or during the sighting we both looked at each other and were like, "do you see that?"  "yes, what the heck is that." and then we discussed this and what it could be and why it was silent despite moving incredibly fast.  where i live is really rural and very very quiet.  when i say silent, i mean not a single sound from this thing in spite of it being way to close and way to fast to be silent.

the other thing about this is that during the time of the sighting there was a top secret military installation north of my town or eureka, s.D..  no one was ever told what was going on there.  we all just assumed it had to do with missile silo's or something like that.  i remember there were all these military guys and they didn't sleep in town so they must have had a place out of town for them to sleep.  they did come into town and were at some house parties that we had and some of the guys dated some of the girls in my high school class. my vague memory is that they were air force.
content.summary: A blue orb ufo decended silently, it was too close to not have a sound, hovered and then ascended in the same path

content.detailedDescription:
I can’t remember the exact date, it was a very clear night and i was walking home at about 1 am with my friend we stopped at a play ground to talk. we climbed up on top of the wooded “castle” structure at the park. i noticed a light blinking on the horizon far off, i thought it was a star and inquired about it. (i was from up north so in fl where we were, you could see many more stars than i was used to) my friend suggested it was a satellite. then we noticed it was moving across the sky slowly, and it peaked our interest we watched as it came closer and we noticed its flight pattern was not straight (like a planes would be) but slowly in a zig zag pattern as if it was hovering back and forth some distance each way. slowly moving back and forth east to west but in a continuous southern direction towards us ( i would estimate this came from many miles away from us based on the clarity and size of lights from the beginning of watching it to when it came close.  it slowly came closer maybe 30 minutes went by we watched it the whole time. at first we could only see lights blinking but as it got closer it looked to be three lights (two white one orange i think) either blinking on and off one after the other along the “edge” of the craft or possibly the edge was moving. (i am not sure) the rest of the craft was black and made no sound that we could hear. the craft seemed to be flat on top and bottom though it was difficult to determine as it was black and nighttime.  as it got even closer we could no longer see the lights on the edge. we could just see the underneath (which was completely black) and the only reason we could see just how huge it was, was because it blocked our view of the stars. it flew directly over us i cannot judge how far up it was because it made no sound to relate to. but if it was low it was completely blocking at least about the size of two foot ball fields worth of stars out. if it was higher up it was even bigger… it was very big and a solid shape (i think i remember it as triangle but it could have been a rectangle moving with one of the corners forward. it was completely silent; if we did not watch it approach i am not sure we would have noticed it. 
when the craft was directly over head we got scared and jumped down to hide underneath the wooden castle, because we thought, ‘if we could see it could probably see us.’ (we were both about 20 years old at the time) we only stayed under the structure for about 20 seconds but i can’t remember watching it leave at all. i just remember him and me standing at the edge of the park talking about how amazing seeing it was and talking about “did we really just see that? i don’t think we lost any time i got to my house about 2:20 am which was about a 5 minute walk from the park. 
our location is the blue blurb in the map i sent.
content.summary: Very large black craft aproached slowly for about 30 minutes from far away

content.detailedDescription: Saw and watched lights for a few minutes before i started recording. low in horizon and then it moved upward at a fast rate of speed. i am also sending photo of area so you can see the area during daylight.
content.summary: Saw lights, recorded event. it then went up at fast rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was a freshman in high school. my brother and uncle were spending the weekend at grand parents house. at apx 8 am on sunday morning a neighbor called to tell us to go outside and see what was up in the sky. at this time of year most mornings there is broken low cloud cover traveling from s.E. to n.W.Clouds are moving at a fast clip. directly overhead there is an object that is stationary and directly over us. looking at the bottom of this object it is glowing an almost ultra-violent blue. however there was a black circle in the center which takes up apx 20-25% of the area. we watched this object for almost an hour and it did not move. we were about to go back inside when we heard a deep rumbling sound. flying in from the south east toward the object was an u s air force aircraft. we could see it very clearly following the engine exhaust even though it was painter camouflage and flying thru the broken cloud cover. the plane ( i found out a couple of weeks ago was a martin/general dynamics rb-57f canberra. these were converted b-57 bombers, there were 21 built.) we were able to track the plane by the engine exhaust, this plane had the engines on each wing. this design is how i was able to identify the type. all other planes types had engines mounted inside of them. the jet flew by the object on the east side at apx 500 + ft. distance from object. the engines turn off when the plane was apx 300-500 ft distance came back on when the plane past. the plane circled and passed on the opposite side of object. same thing happened with the engines. what was so noticeable is that it appeared that the engine cut off like a light switch, no sound and no exhaust until the plain was past and then turned on again. i did not know jets could do this. according to information about this plane some were stationed at webb afb texas. the plane flew s-east and we could hear the engines increase speed. the object was near the broken cloud cover but did not move for at least one hour. we last saw it at apx 10 a m and it had moved away apx 3+ miles to the east side of town. we could then see that the top structure was bell shapes and bright like stainless steel. the sighting made the news and the next day the air force said it was a weather balloon. why would a balloon stay stationary near rapidly moving cloud cover for over an hour, and why would the air force send one of their most advanced aircraft to look at a balloon? and when we last saw it, it had traveled cross ways from the wind direction and had not seemed to have gained altitude. something else i discovered, the object was apx 2-3 times the size of the aircraft. this made the object rather large. compared to air plane size : rb-57f canberra / converted b-57 bomber / 2 man cock pit crew wing span 122+ ft. / vertical tail stabilizer 19 ft. this plane was used because of the operational ceiling 65,000+ ft. also i read that there were additional crew within the plane up to 7 additional crew as needed to operate equipment.
content.summary: Ufo hovered directly over us for apx 30 min.& air force plain flue by it.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 4:43 am i was in my back yard having a cigarette.  the sky was crystal clear, and as usual i was looking up at the sky, looking at the orion constellation. then in front of me i saw a bright green, white, blue, light with a tail. reminding me of a falling star, except much larger, and slower. then i thought of the meteor over russia. as i watched this object, i had time to think how big it appeared, and that it was traveling silently.  it lasted several seconds, 4-8. as it moved across my field of vision the tail seemed to be sparking, or breaking off in pieces.  it was close enough that i expected to hear a crash, as it seemed to be traveling in a downward direction. as it travelled behind structures and out of my sight,  i thought i should go see if i could find it, thinking that it would have come down very close. i did not go though. i do not know what it was. i know it was not a simple falling star. it was way to big, and moving way to slow.
content.summary: A large, bright, green, and white object falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gotten into my car when i saw a flash of light through my sunroof.I kept looking and saw a fairly large circle of light. the color of the lights were red, orange, and some yellow. all i could see at the moment was this light shining just above the treetops and in between my house and the neighbors. the light then suddenly went off. i quickly got out of my car keeping my eyes toward what i had seen. i could see nothing but blue sky and low hovering clouds. then the light suddenly came back on. it was almost in the same spot except a little closer to me. concentrating on what i was seeing i tried to make the best mental notes i could. i started to make out the outline of the craft. as i followed the thin fuzzy outline of the craft around it became clear to me that it was huge. the majority of the craft was already over me and thousands of feet wide. i heard no sound coming from it. i felt no wind or saw any kind stream coming from behind it.I could only see the faint outline of about one third of the craft and the color of the sky above it. it was like i was looking straight through it and seeing the sky above it. the circle of light went out again. not believing what i'm seeing i scanning the outline of the craft. the light came on again and was almost directly above me. focusing intensely on the light i could make out the structures and details inside the circle of light. i made a detail mental note of the structures.

the craft kept moving slowly over me. the light went off again so i began to focus on the rear of the craft as it passed over me. focusing on the thin outline i began to see a haze or fuzziness behind the craft as if it was distorting the light and air around it. i kept watching the outline of the craft move over me and towards what i believe to be the northeast. it was basically going down my street. i watched it until i could not see it anymore. i was so excited i ran into the house to tell my wife! after telling my wife i sat down and notes and sketches of what i saw.
content.summary: The outline of a triangle and reflecting the sky above it on the bottom of the craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to the grocery store but i noticed an upside down white triangle on top of another upside down floating in the sky. i was at a stoplight and as i watched,a circle of mist pushed out around the triangles and then they kind of blinked away and the mist disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a white triangle on top of another white triangle floating in the sky. a mist pushed out in a circle around the triangles and the object just just faded out and the mist vanished and blue sky appeared where it was.

content.detailedDescription: Around 3:00 am,my girlfriend woke up,and went to smoke a cigarette outside,she came and woke me up,and when i went outside,this metalic object was just floating in the middle of the street on a southbound path,it stopped,decended,ascended to south west path,turned sideways,and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Floating metalic object,floated down street,hovered,changed direction,turned sideways dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
Le mercredi 6 octobre 2010 entre 20h15 et 20h17 j ai pu observer un ovni triangulaire , noir mat ,trois lampes clignotante blanche à chaque extrémités, plus une rouge clignotante au centre de l objet, celui ci étant très bas. j'ai pu le voir de très prés il était assez grand se déplaçait très lentement j ai pu le suivre a pied en marchant parallèle a lui . sa trajectoire ,et mon déplacement font que je me suis retrouvé pratiquement sous l objet. celui ci ne faisait aucun bruit (moteur,sifflement, etc rien pas de souffle ,pas d odeur ) l objet a continuer sa route en silence puis a environ trente mètres, de moi sur ma gauche ,il a pivoter et non tourner sur sa droite ,puis est parti toujours lentement en prenant de l altitude se dirigeant vers une colline.Cette observation a était faite dans le lot et garonne , golfech , centrale nucléaire.

i see blacl triangle above nuclear plant with white pulsating lights above  and move above nuclear plant slowly then disappear my sight. there is film available from a cellphone.
content.summary: Ufo hovering above nuclear plant in golfech- france
